witnessStr: David Schalk van der Merwe, en Anna Maria Pretorius
source: Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Tulbagh,  Baptism register, 1743 to 2 Feb 1800, page 190, entry number 31. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G4 7/1. Transcribed by Lynn Couperthwaite, Trysie Joubert, Richard Ball  as part of the eGGSA Project, from VC 657, Cape Archives Repository.
searchParameters: Father with van den bergh anywhere in the surname with Abraham Paulus anywhere in the first name in all the registers.
